mapper.sql: select h.operType,h.detail,h.modUser,h.inTime from umpay.t_hfoper_log h where h.tableName='UMPAY.T_SERVICE_INF' and h.dataId=:dataId order by h.inTime desc
select h.detail,h.modUser,h.inTime from umpay.t_hfoper_log h where h.tableName='UMPAY.T_MER_GRADE' and h.dataId=:dataId order by h.inTime desc
